overview:
Mr. Kumar serves as Vice President of Sales for Navatar Group and is based out of the India office. He is responsible for all sales, pre-sales and field development activities around Asia and EMEA market and across Navatar Group’s entire product line and services.

Mr. Kumar has extensive experience in building value in high growth technology companies. Prior to joining Navatar Group, Mr. Kumar has worked with product companies, consulting service organizations and system integrators. He has broad based experience in enterprise software sales, building and managing teams and sales channels, including international operations. Most recently, Mr. Kumar served as Sales Director, Asia Pacific at Triple Point Technology, Inc., the leader in enterprise software solutions for commodity trading and risk management.
